name: Heavy Metal Titans
description: Heavy Metal Titans is a modern-retro Run n’ Gun Shoot ‘em up that takes players on a bloodsoaked time traveling quest to defeat General Glen Planamento and retrieve the stolen time crystal, a powerful relic that can manipulate time and reality. Choose one of seven playable characters (plus two unlockables) including a vampire, a dragon slayer, an old west cowboy, and real-life pro wrestler: WARHORSE! Each hero has been ripped from his own timeline by the gods of Olympus to assemble….The Heavy Metal Titans!  Slash, shoot, and pound your way through a violent alien war, spanning over multiple timelines with a heart-pounding heavy metal soundtrack, all while the action is called by legendary game announcer, Tim Kitzrow! So grab a controller and light ‘em up!
